location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Captain Robert Taylor, Resident at Bussora [Basra]

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has resulted in a small hole in the fabric of the folio that slightly obscures some of the body of the letter.

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident at Bussora [Basra] that his packet for the Accountant General will be conveyed to Bombay via the Francis Warden. It also notes that the Resident at Bushire has not paid the bearer the fee he demanded, since he has not received any instructions on the matter.
